price: 31. Maalinta Qiyaamahana waxaad ku doodeysaan Rabbigiin horti.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمۡ تَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma innakum yawma al-qiyāmati ʿinda rabbikum takhtaṣimūna
